categories: Category:Battles of the Great Jedi Purge

nodes.text: The Battle of Dellalt was one of the last battles of the Clone Wars Outer Rim Sieges. After Order 66, a number of Jedi managed to escape here, but were pursued by Imperial forces. Six of the surviving Jedi stole an SX troop shuttle, disguising it as the Vagabond Trader. They were eventually rescued by the Drunk Dancer.
